casebody.data:
LIBERTY MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, dba Liberty International Underwriters, et al., petitioners,
v.
CARRIZO OIL & GAS, INCORPORATED. No. 18-436. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 10, 2018.

Motion of American Institute of Marine Underwriters for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
